title: Love Live! Superstar!!
original_name: ラブライブ！スーパースター!!
opening_song: "START!! True dreams" by Liella! [Kanon Shibuya (Sayuri Date), Keke Tang (Liyuu), Chisato Arashi (Nako Misaki), Sumire Heanna (Naomi Payton), Ren Hazuki (Nagisa Aoyama)] (eps 2-??)
ending_song: #1: "Mirai Yohou Hallelujah! (未来予報ハレルヤ！)" by Liella! (ep 1)
sinopse:
A new television anime series for the Love Live! franchise was announced by animation studio Sunrise on January 28, 2020. The tagline for the new anime reads, "Watashi wo Kanaeru Monogatari. Hello!!! Love Live!"

(Source: MAL News)
